page.title: 07Vines Farm Shop
page.content: Vines Farm and Farm shop is signposted on the A31 Bere Regis to Wimborne road and attracts{holiday {trade}besides serving the villages of Upton, Lytchett Matravers, Lytchett Minster and Sturminster Marshall The horticultural venture comprises {50 acres}of vegetables, flowers and glasshouses together with home-produced beef. Some fruit and vegetables are bought in for retail and pork and lamb are bought in to retail in the butchery department. Home made pies are baked on the premises. Packs of meat for freezer storage are prepared and customers come from {Poole & Bournemouth}and{Wimborne}to purchase. There appeared to be a good passing trade whilst we were there.
